name: Time´s (NOT) Up!
description:
My Submission for the 2020 Epic MegaJam. 

Play as old Gramps who are not done yet.

Multiplayer included (more fun!) but you need a gamepad for player 2.

Everything in the Game was made by me in one week over the competition.

I made the music with Music Maker, the sprites with Photoshop and the sounds with Audacity.
